articles.title: China fossils show new species of extinct giant rhino that roamed Asia - TODAYonline
articles.description: BEIJING -     Fossils found in northwest China's Gansu province indicate a new species of giant rhino that lived more than 26 million years ago, according to a paper published in the journal Communications Biology on Thursday.
